ygData.subject: Re: Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: Kluster cut off his comm. Phobia hears the comm cut off briefly, and suspects treachery. (He s a Predacon they do that.) So he a got something planned for me.

Kluster cut off his comm. Phobia hears the comm cut off briefly, and 
suspects treachery. (He's a Predacon they do that.) "So he'a got 
something planned for me. I'm not worried though. he'll be surprised 
if he tries anything."he thought for a moment. Paranoia was one of 
his weaknesses, and arrogance was his biggest downfall.

"Kluster are you sure you want to have the parts delivered outside of 
your scanner range? Thats quite a trip to move such delicate 
machinery. surely you have a landing bay that could fit my ship. 
Maybe you could deactivate your guns long enough for me to land." 
Phobia looked down at his sensor equipment it would be to tempting to 
land that far away with the knowledge of the cargo he's carrying. "I 
await your response.

He decided to be cautious and cover himself just in case he needed a 
quick outlet."Computer activate the babies at the Predacon base.

(For whoevers at Hell Beasts old base, Mosquitor and co.)
A baby attatches itself to the comm system activating the comm unit 
broadcasting a message to the highest ranking predacon available.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster frowns. "I'm not saying ANY crime, Phobia, but we'll do our 
best to 
> overlook them. However, for security purposes, the computer is 
programmed to 
> recognize all predacons as enemies. If you can deliver your goods 
outside of 
> the range of the defences, my troops could pick them up."
> 
> He turns around, shutting off his end of the conversation with 
Phobia (Phobia 
> can talk to him but not hear him).
> 
> "Hysteria," he says into his comm, "We'll be having a shipment of 
technology 
> soon. Since you're the techbot, can you check it out?"
> 
> He turns back around, once again activating his end of the line to 
Phobia.
